Posts.Content: hi guys I found a breast lump on my right breast ( quite large ,hard and definatly not smooth) went to gp, reffered to Breast clinic where i had a ultrasound done the Dc did a FNA right there. i got called back for a core biopsy ,where the Dc took 4 samples. this was the last time i heard ? spoke/saw anything from the breast clinic. that was 20th oct 2016 well today 01 nov i receive a letter inviting me to an appointment with a general surgeon at the hospital. the lump is still there still hard does not hurt and hasnt changed size at all....im worried out of my mind! called them up and they cant tell me over the phone i have to wait 10 days more?!!! so since the biopsy too this new appointmen thats nearly 3 weeks.  what should i expect? in concerned and my hubby is so worried too someone please shed some light on this for me xxxxx
Posts.Title: awaiting results for a breast core biopsy

Posts.Content: im 35 years old. yes i do walk , in fact i have just got back to all these lovely messages after taking my beagle for a long walk in the woods! i just feel a little lost at the moment, i almost cant beleive this is all happening even though i dont know whtas happening?1 does that make sence? hope so  ha needles< im ok with those x its silence i cant handle
Posts.Title: awaiting results for a breast core biopsy

Posts.Content: thank you for your reply, the Dr i have been reffered tois a oncology and breast cancer specialist (damn you google!!) the waiting is awful, i suffer with depression and high anxiety (only diagnosed a few months ago) so all this cancer scare is obviously excerting my anxiety. my husband has set up private health care but im not sure if its going to be quicker or not. we also have 2 young boys 12 and 6 and trying not to be concerned in front of them is awful. just wish we all knew. i hope your wife has made a full recovery xx
Posts.Title: awaiting results for a breast core biopsy
